Today we found out that one of our regulars has been donating her paintings to‚Ä¶
column3:
So I teach at a paint-and-sip place. 

Today we found out that one of our regulars has been donating her paintings to a homeless shelter so that when people transition out they have art to hang in their new homes.

It's things like this that remind me how beautiful kindness is.
